original_text: Therefore the he goat waxed very great: and when he was strong, the great horn was broken; and for it came up four notable ones toward the four winds of heaven.
korean_text: 숫염소가 스스로 심히 강대하여 가더니 강성할 때에 그 큰 뿔이 꺾이고 그 대신에 현저한 뿔 넷이 하늘 사방을 향하여 났더라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the he goat waxed very great
and for it came up four notable ones
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 대신하여 네 개의 뚜렷한 뿔이 돋아났으니

sentences.original_text: toward the four winds of heaven
